title: Colin Powell’s Funeral Will Feature Three U.S. Presidents
sub_head: Retired general, diplomat will be remembered by predecessor Madeleine Albright, his deputy and son
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden and two former presidents will be among those celebrating the life of Colin Powell, who served top national-security roles and spent decades in the military, at his funeral Friday.
Mr. Powell’s service is set for noon at the Washington National Cathedral, where expected attendees include Mr. Biden and first lady Jill Biden along with former President Barack Obama and his wife, Michelle; former President George W. Bush and his wife, Laura; and Hillary Clinton, the former secretary of state and first lady, organizers say. Antony Blinken, the current secretary of state, also is expected to attend.
